title: Transparent Public Procurement Platform
author: Anti-Corruption Coalition
summary: An open-source e-procurement system that ensures transparency in government purchases, from tender announcement to contract completion.
problemStatement: Public procurement in Bangladesh is plagued by corruption, bid rigging, and lack of transparency. Studies estimate that 10-25% of procurement budgets are lost to corruption annually.
proposedSolution: Create an end-to-end digital procurement platform that automates the entire procurement lifecycle with built-in transparency mechanisms, audit trails, and public oversight features.
technicalArchitecture: Backend: Python Django with REST APIs

implementationPhases.description: Core platform development and pilot ministry
All government bodies and local governments

expectedImpact: Save ৳5,000+ crore annually from reduced corruption
Increase SME participation in government contracts
Improve public trust in government spending
